outputs.output_descr: The objective of this Initiation Plan (IP) is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in the climate change thematic area addressing barriers to wind power development in Belarus through developing and adopting new secondary to support wind energy in Belarus, building local capacity and raising awareness in the wind energy area, implementing demonstrations projects in selected areas, along with ensuring replication and sustainability of project successful results.

project_descr: PREPARATORY GRANT: Removing Barriers to Wind Power Development in Belarus.
